footer.company_full: AYK Project Engineering Electric Industry and Trade Ltd. Co.

hero.title: Trusted engineering, sustainable energy, lasting value.
hero.subtitle: 25+ years of experience in electricity, solid engineering and turnkey projects.

about.title: About Us
about.body: AYK Project Electric Ltd. Co. is a company that provides innovative and customer-focused services in the field of electrical engineering. Since our establishment, we have aimed to deliver the most suitable and efficient solutions to our clients by combining modern technologies with the expertise of our experienced team. Our range of services is wide, aiming to add value to projects of all scales. We operate in many areas from electrical infrastructure design and implementation to automation systems and energy efficiency projects. In addition, we design and manufacture distribution, control, and compensation panels for Medium Voltage (MV) and Low Voltage (LV) systems. By collaborating with leading brands in the sector, we provide our customers with high-quality products in both retail and wholesale electrical material sales. We closely follow technology and prioritize customer satisfaction by ensuring on-time and complete delivery of our projects. Our experienced engineers, technicians, and technical staff provide all the services you need in material selection, project design, site survey, and installation. We aim to strengthen our position in the sector by constantly expanding our service network.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.body: Our vision is to be the leading company in national and international projects, recognized for innovation, quality, and reliability. By closely following technological developments and leveraging the expertise of our experienced team, we aim to maximize customer satisfaction, provide sustainable solutions that shape the sector, and raise industry standards.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.body: At AYK Project Electric, our mission is to deliver innovative, efficient, and high-quality engineering solutions that fully meet our customers’ needs. By combining modern technologies with the expertise of our experienced team, we aim to add value to projects of all scales and contribute to the development of the industry. With professionalism, reliability, and a customer-focused approach, we strive to deliver our projects on time and completely, while committing to maintain the highest quality standards.

why.title: Why AYK Project Electric?
items: 25+ years of engineering experience, corporate structuring since 2018
Wide service range from MV/LV infrastructure to PV projects
Branded electrical material sales and transparent cost management
Discipline in project management, on-time delivery and sustainable solutions
Long-term customer support with maintenance, monitoring and reporting

Technical accuracy and quality
Customer satisfaction focus

meta.title: Services | AYK Project Electric
meta.description: Project consultancy & engineering, electrical contracting, electrical material sales, low current systems, solar energy systems, and maintenance & service.

services.title: Services
services.intro: We provide engineering-focused services tailored to your project needs. Below you can see our main service categories and their scope.

proje-danismanlik-muhendislik.title: Project Consultancy & Engineering
proje-danismanlik-muhendislik.desc: Survey, design, specifications and discovery summary, cost optimization, implementation supervision.

elektrik-elektronik-taahhut.title: Electrical Contracting
elektrik-elektronik-taahhut.desc: Infrastructure, cabling, panel assembly, commissioning and testing processes.

elektrik-malzemesi-satisi.title: Electrical Material Sales
elektrik-malzemesi-satisi.desc: Supply of branded products; retail and wholesale price advantage.

gunes-enerji-sistemleri.title: Solar Energy Systems (PV)
gunes-enerji-sistemleri.desc: Turnkey design, installation and monitoring of rooftop/land PV projects.

bakim-servis.title: Maintenance & Service
bakim-servis.desc: Periodic maintenance, fault intervention and performance improvement.

items.q: How does your survey and quotation process work?
items.a: After the initial meeting, a site survey is scheduled within 24–72 hours. Once the technical scope is clarified, a summary quotation is shared the same day, and a detailed technical-financial proposal within 2–5 business days.

items.q: What is the average duration of PV projects?
items.a: Depending on rooftop or land scale, it takes between 25–60 days. It covers survey, design, approvals, installation, and commissioning stages.

items.q: What is included in maintenance and warranty?
items.a: Workmanship warranty and manufacturer warranty conditions apply. With a periodic maintenance contract, performance monitoring, thermal inspection and reporting are provided.

meta.title: KVKK | AYK Project Electric
meta.description: Information text under the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698.

kvkk.title: Personal Data Protection Law (KVKK)
kvkk.intro: In accordance with Law No. 6698, as AYK Project Electric Ltd. Co., we take care to protect your personal data. This text has been prepared to explain the purposes of processing your data, the retention period, and your rights.

controller.title: Data Controller
controller.body: AYK Project Electric Ltd. Co. processes your personal data as a 'Data Controller' within the scope of KVKK. You can reach our contact details

purposes.title: Purposes of Processing Personal Data
purposes.body: They are processed within the scope of customer relations, quotations, contract processes, fulfillment of legal obligations and customer satisfaction.

transfer.title: Transfer
transfer.body: Your data may be shared only within the framework of the legislation and limited to the specified purposes with our business partners, official institutions, and service providers.

retention.title: Retention Period
retention.body: Your personal data are stored during the periods stipulated in the legislation or until the processing purpose ceases; thereafter, they are securely destroyed.

rights.title: Your Rights
items: To learn whether your data is being processed
To request information if it has been processed
To learn whether it is used in accordance with its purpose
To request correction if it is incomplete/incorrect
To request deletion or destruction
To request notification if it has been transferred to third parties

footer.text: To exercise your rights or get detailed information

meta.title: Privacy Notice | AYK Project Electric
meta.description: Privacy notice regarding the processing of personal data by AYK Project Electric Ltd. Co.

privacy.title: Privacy Notice Regarding the Processing of Personal Data
privacy.intro: In accordance with Law No. 6698, this privacy notice has been prepared by AYK Project Electric Ltd. Co., as the data controller, regarding the processing of your personal data.
privacy.kvkk_link_text: You can review our KVKK text

controller.title: Data Controller
controller.body: AYK Project Electric Ltd. Co. processes your personal data as a data controller. For contact

collection.title: Collection Method
collection.body: Your data may be obtained through web forms, e-mail/phone correspondence, contracts, quotations, site surveys and service processes, automatically or semi-automatically, in physical and electronic environments.

purposes.title: Purposes of Processing
items: Execution of quotation, survey, contract and project management processes
Customer relations and service quality management
Fulfillment of legal obligations and notifications to authorized institutions
Financial and accounting transactions (invoice, collection, etc.)
Operational security, maintenance and audit activities

legal.title: Legal Grounds
legal.body: Within the scope of KVKK articles 5 and 6; explicit stipulation in the laws, necessity for the establishment or execution of a contract, fulfillment of legal obligations, legitimate interest of the data controller, and explicit consent when required.

transfer.title: Transfer
transfer.body: Your personal data may be transferred to our service providers, business partners, legally authorized public institutions, and, in mandatory cases, domestic third parties from whom we receive hosting/IT services, in compliance with KVKK provisions and limited to the purpose.

retention.title: Retention Period
retention.body: Your data are stored for the periods stipulated in the legislation and/or required by the processing purpose; at the end of the period, they are deleted, destroyed, or anonymized in accordance with the legislation.

rights.title: Rights of the Data Subject
rights.body: According to KVKK article 11; you have the right to request information about your personal data, request correction, deletion/destruction, learn whether it is used in accordance with the purpose, and request notification if it has been transferred to third parties.

application.title: Application Method
application.body: You can submit your requests regarding your rights together with documents enabling identity verification, in writing or via KEP, secure electronic signature, or through the channels determined by the Company. Applications are concluded as soon as possible in accordance with the legislation.

footer.link: Reach us via our contact page
